first: Collection of works and relevant information
credits: Layout and code by Raissa Hohenester
presentation: I am a front-end developer living in Bavaria and have been working in the labor market since 2009. I met HTML in 2003, amused myself with pixel art, completed a technical computer course in 2008, graduated in Web Design and Graphic in 2011. Parallel to this, I never left the area of Web Development.
